item.title: Quartz Documentation
item.description: Setup Welcome to Quartz! Whether you’re setting up a website and project for the first time or a seasoned digital gardener, I hope that you’ll find something useful about this project. Let’s get to business and get you started! 📚 Setup your own digital garden using Quartz 🔗 Linking with an Obsidian Vault 🎨 Customizing and Styling Quartz 🌍 Hosting Quartz online! Troubleshooting 🚧 Troubleshooting and FAQ 🐛 Submit an Issue
